attributes.action: Provide safety for our children on school buses, making seatbelts compulsary by law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My Daughter, like thousands of other young children, is travelling on a bus twice a day at 60 mph, which has no seat belts fitted.The children are continuously being told to sit down, as they get out of their seats all the time, and the driver needs to be consentrating on the road and not the children.It seems very wrong when the law is so strict on this matter in any other vehical.How this is not already a law I don't know. I WORRY THAT NOTHING WILL BE DONE UNTILL IT'S TOO LATE.THERE'S AN ACCIDENT WAITING TO HAPPEN HERE, LETS STOP IT FROM HAPPENING. Please sign the petition.
